The Facebook post claiming possible coro: Texas was flagged by Facebook as part of their efforts to combat false news and misinformation.
The account Brownsville Online: which was the source of the screenshot in the Facebook post, did not have any posts claiming two possible coronavirus cases at the medical center.
Health officials in the area: including the spokesperson for the hospital and the Hidalgo County health and human services department, have stated that there are no cases of coronavirus in the Rio Grande Valley.
